This represents the grid of directions for characters to move to find the player character

PFNode - Class in src.Map
The Path finding grid consists of Path Finding Nodes that store distance to the player and the direction to move to get to the player as quickly as possible
PFNode(int, int) - Constructor for class src.Map.PFNode
